name: Ningxia night market food tour
description:
Night market serves as the best place for tasting authentic
Taiwanese local food. Among all of the night markets, Ningxia night market
ranks top on the wish list for locals and tourists alike with its wide variety
of food and its fatal aura of vitality. Ningxia night market has accumulated
the most famous Taiwanese street food from the South to the North of Taiwan, to
name a few such as chicken rolls with rice, pork leg, oyster pancake and a lot
more. In addition to the local cuisine, you can experience the hustle and
bustle of night market and enjoy the relaxation in the Taipei night life.
